title: Bobby's 'Employee Of The Month' Award Goes To... + Rejected Segments: Lunchbox Calls Tiger Woods In The Hospital + Raymundo Takes The Polar Plunge!
itunes:title: Bobby's 'Employee Of The Month' Award Goes To... + Rejected Segments: Lunchbox Calls Tiger Woods In The Hospital + Raymundo Takes The Polar Plunge!
description:
Bobby reveals who is the winner for Employee of the Month for February. But everyone has to give their speech after being eliminated from contention as if they won. Bobby gives his Top 5 rejected segments based on ideas that the show members sent in that were not used. Raymundo makes good on his bet and takes the polar plunge! We hear how it went. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
